lesson.title_and_level: Intermediate - Calling a Supplier for a Quote

sentence.idiomatic: She works in the sales department.
Excuse me, where is the sales department?
I’m looking for Miss Wang in the sales department.
We will speak again about the specific items after we get back.
You should make a decision after you understand the circumstance.
We still don’t know the specific reason.
I recommend you go to this restaurant. Their food is first-rate.
His computer is awesome. You can ask him for help.
Her dancing is awesome.
The quantity of their order has already exceeded 20,000 units.
In May, the volume of orders for computers started to increase substantially.
What is the quantity of your order?
How many feet is your container?
The snow on the ground is one foot deep.
How many feet tall is this tree?
Have you decided to place an order?
I want to know why they still aren’t placing an order.
You can place an order on the internet.
We still haven’t fix the dispatch time for the goods.
We already sent out the goods yesterday.
When will you dispatch the goods for delivery?
This time the price of all the merchandise has fallen by an average of 30 percent.
The average age of the athletes who are participating in the competition is only eighteen years old.
The average price of housing here is 8,500 yuan per square meter.
Hello, is this Mr. Li of the Marketing Department? I would like to find out the specific circumstances of your merchandise.
Oh, sure, sure. You are the Canadian – Peter, right? My colleague told me your Chinese is awesome!
You’re flattering me. I would like to ask, what is your minimum order quantity?
Generally the minimum order quantity is a 40 foot container. But, considering that this is your first order, a 20 foot container would also be all right.
How many hammers can be loaded onto one 20 foot container? What is the approximate price?
Approximately 2000 hammers. About $8,000.00 US.
Is that price CIF or FOB?
CIF. If the quantity is higher, we can give you a discount.
From the time of placing the order to dispatch of the goods for delivery, what is the lead time?
On average 4 to 6 weeks.
I see. Mr. Li, thank you.
Not at all. I hope we can work together.
